attributes.action: Make the speed limits for HGV's in Scotland the same as England and Wales.
attributes.additional_details: HGV's have a lot of up to date safety features and driver aids. Also the drivers pass a lot of tests and do a lot of training to he able to drive a HGV. They are probably the safest drivers out there.
attributes.background: The speed limit for HGV's in England and Wales was raised years a go but still Scotland haven't raised theirs. Surely it's about time this was sorted and raised from 40mph to 50mph on single carriageways and from 50mph to 60mph on dual carriageways.

rejection.details:
The power to set the speed limit on roads in Scotland is devolved to the Scottish Parliament. 

You might wish to consider starting a petition on the Scottish Government's website. You can find out more about how to do this here: https://www.parliament.scot/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx.
